allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/Color::Rgb(255, 215, 0)/theme.browser_item_focused/g; s/\.set_bg(Color::Black)/.set_bg(theme.browser_background)/g; s/\.bg(Color::Black)/.bg(theme.browser_background)/g; s/\.set_fg(Color::Cyan)/.set_fg(theme.browser_item_normal)/g; s/\.fg(Color::Cyan)/.fg(theme.browser_border)/g; s/Color::Cyan/theme.browser_border/g; s/\.set_fg(Color::White)/.set_fg(theme.text_primary)/g; s/\.fg(Color::White)/.fg(theme.text_primary)/g; s/\.set_fg(Color::Gray)/.set_fg(theme.menu_separator)/g; s/Color::Gray/theme.menu_separator/g; s/Color::DarkGray/theme.text_disabled/g; s/Color::Yellow/theme.browser_item_focused/g' src/frontend/tui/$file.rs)
Bash(for file in highlight_form keybind_form color_form spell_color_form)
